sentences.en: a tacit agreement between the three big companies
sentences.cn: 三家大公司之间的默契

sentences.en: By tacit agreement they turned to the wine to dispel their discontent.
sentences.cn: 他们不约而同的想拿酒杀气.

sentences.en: He just knows original tacit agreement also is not so good.
sentences.cn: 他才知原来默契也不是那么好啊.

sentences.en: Her uncle seemed to regard his sister - in - law with a sort of tacit antipathy.
sentences.cn: 她的叔叔似乎对他那个 嫂嫂 怀有一种不言而喻的嫌恶.

sentences.en: Language teaching knowledge includes explicit teaching knowledge and tacit teaching knowledge.
sentences.cn: 语文教学知识包括显性教学知识和缄默教学知识.

sentences.en: Lu Tzu - hsiao had grown very aloof, a tacit understanding having been reached between them.
sentences.cn: 陆子 潇 跟他十份疏远,大家心照不宣.

sentences.en: Our tacit treaty with her was that we could play on her lawn.
sentences.cn: 我们和她心照不宣的协定是,我们可以在她的草坪上玩.

sentences.en: Still, this form of indirect communication and tacit restraint was slow and chancy.
sentences.cn: 不过, 这种间接信息和暗自抑制的方式,毕竟还是太慢,而且也不太确实.

sentences.en: The deal had the tacit approval of the President.
sentences.cn: 这笔交易得到总统的默许.

sentences.en: The final tacit understanding between us is to smilingly.
sentences.cn: 我们之间最后的默契,就是笑着离开.

sentences.en: The other is tacit knowledge which is not easily visible and expressible.
sentences.cn: 而另一种知识是隐性知识,不容易看见和表达,它万全是个人知识,难于形式化.

sentences.en: The question was a tacit admission that a mistake had indeed been made.
sentences.cn: 问这个问题实际上等于默认确实出了差错。

sentences.en: They were leagued together by a tacit treaty.
sentences.cn: 他们根据默契关系联合起来了.

sentences.en: This unscientific and tacit justification arises from the fact that forecast offices are usually understaffed.
sentences.cn: 这个不科学和含糊的理由产生于预报部门普遍人手不足.

sentences.en: With that tacit permission, he pulled out a pack of Camels and field it toward her.
sentences.cn: 得到这一默许之后, 他拿出一包骆驼牌香烟来,向她伸过去.

sentences.en: Your silence implies tacit consent to these proposals.
sentences.cn: 你的沉默意味着你默许这些提议.

trans.tran_cn: 缄默的，心照不宣的，<律>由法律的效力而产生的
trans.tran_en: tacit agreement, approval, support etc is given without anything actually being said
